javadoc:
Defines data that is available for drag/drop and clipboard transfers.
 The data is an ArrayList of DragDropNode objects.

methods.javadoc:
Constructs a new Transferable from the array of DragDropNodes
@param nodes the array of DragDropNodes being transfered.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new Transferable from the array of DragDropNodes

params.name: nodes
params.comment: the array of DragDropNodes being transfered.

methods.javadoc: Return all data flavors that this class supports.
methods.name: getTransferDataFlavors
methods.comment: Return all data flavors that this class supports.

methods.javadoc:
Return whether the specifed data flavor is supported.
@param f the DataFlavor to check if supported.
methods.name: isDataFlavorSupported
methods.comment: Return whether the specifed data flavor is supported.

params.name: f
params.comment: the DataFlavor to check if supported.

methods.javadoc:
Return the transfer data with the given data flavor.
@param f the DataFlavor for which to get a Transferable.
methods.name: getTransferData
methods.comment: Return the transfer data with the given data flavor.

params.name: f
params.comment: the DataFlavor for which to get a Transferable.

methods.javadoc: Get the string representation for this transferable.
methods.name: toString
methods.comment: Get the string representation for this transferable.

methods.name: lostOwnership
methods.comment:
Notification we have lost ownership of the clipboard because 
 something else was put on the clipboard.

params.name: contents
params.comment: the Transferable lost in the clipboard.

name: DragDropTreeTransferable
comment:
Defines data that is available for drag/drop and clipboard transfers.
 The data is an ArrayList of DragDropNode objects.

fields.javadoc:
A static instance of the local tree node flavor that is an
 ArrayList of DragDropNode objects.
fields.name: localTreeNodeFlavor
fields.comment:
A static instance of the local tree node flavor that is an
 ArrayList of DragDropNode objects.
